Last updated: 10th August, 2015. 

Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Terms and Conditions") carefully before using the Speech Help Cards application (the "App") developed by Ayoze Pérez Rodríguez ("i", "we", “my” or "our"), with national ID number 42217341J, address Teichgraben, 4, 07743, Jena, Germany, and email info@ayoprez.com. 

Your access to and use of the App is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all users who access or use the App. 

By accessing or using the App you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access or use the App.

The App is available for you own, personal use. The must not be used for commercial purpose whatsoever or for any illegal or unauthorised purpose. Using the App you must comply with all applicable Germany and international laws. 

Accepting this Terms you agree that, when using the App, you will comply with all the law and these Terms. 

Also, you agree to not modify, adapt, translate or reverse engineer any part of the App or re-format or frame any portion of the pages comprising the App, save to the extent expressly permitted by these Terms or by the law. (And, come on, the code is in Github, do not do something unnecessary.)

I may terminate or suspend access to the App immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. \n\nAll provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

The App may contain links to third party web sites, application or services that are not owned or controlled by Ayoze Pérez Rodríguez.

You further acknowledge and agree that Ayoze Pérez Rodríguez shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites, application or services. 

I strongly advise you to read the terms and conditions and privacy policies of any third party web sites, application or services that you visit.

The App contain different library that make the App works. This is a list of this libraries. 

-Android SDK 
-Swipecards 
-Butterknife 
-Crashlytics 

 The user can read the terms of each library in its respective website.

The App do not require any kind of registration to be used, and never would be necessary that the user introduce any kind of personal data. \n\n Using Crashlytics and Answers (both from Fabric, property of Twitter Inc.) the App collect anonymous data with the purpose of find errors and usage patterns to better development of future versions. Any kind of personal data will be collected by the App.
The App and all the content in it (images, texts, icons) belong to Ayoze Pérez Rodríguez. Any use of them will require a citation of the author and origin. Don\'t be thoughtless.
